name: Knight Vs Ninja
description:
A battle between two favourites, a knight and a ninja, to determine who is the best. Defeat your opponent in melee combat or set them ablaze with with fireballs. The choice is yours.

Two player game

Instructions in game

Assets:

Ninja Sprite Sheet - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/ninja-sprite-sheet-free-93901

Knight Sprite Sheet - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/knight-sprite-sheet-free-93897

Standard Assets (Unity) - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/asset-packs/standard-assets-for-unity-2017-3-32351
